Workflow.Name: Employee Awards and Recognition - Activate Program
Workflow.Description:
This workflow will create an instance for every Period, to run every Period Start Date so it can activate the Program.
Every Period Start Date, it will run and it will check: If the Program is inactive, it will set the "Awards And Recognition Setting" record "Program Status" field to "Yes". It will also set the Current Period Start Date and End Date accordingly.
